Bruce Thomas

Security Services Manager

Bruce Thomas manages MILLERGROUP's security services division, bringing 27 years of law enforcement experience with the Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department (LASD). His extensive career in public safety provides clients with proven expertise in crime prevention and security planning.

Law Enforcement Career

During his distinguished 27-year career with LASD, Bruce specialized in crime prevention and community safety initiatives. He developed and implemented security protocols for large-scale events and high-risk environments, earning recognition for his strategic approach to threat mitigation.

Major Event Security

Bruce has extensive experience planning and executing security operations for major events, including coordination with multiple agencies, threat assessment, and crisis response planning. His background includes securing high-profile gatherings, corporate events, and public venues.

Expertise

  • Crime Prevention & Risk Assessment
  • Major Event Security Planning
  • Physical Security Assessments
  • Law Enforcement Coordination
  • Emergency Response Planning
  • Security Training & Development

Professional Approach

Bruce's methodology combines proactive risk identification with practical, implementable solutions. He works closely with clients to understand their unique security needs and develops customized strategies that balance protection with operational efficiency.
